abstract: Finance officials said they had agreed on the basic principles on how to treat sick institutions, but not everyone was pleased with the compromises.
snippet: Finance officials said they had agreed on the basic principles on how to treat sick institutions, but not everyone was pleased with the compromises.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS — As European finance ministers plod toward an agreement on how to wind down ailing banks , details that emerged on Wednesday indicated that the resolution could be as cumbersome and time-consuming as the process to achieve it.

headline.main: E.U. Ministers Stagger Toward Banking Deal
headline.print_headline: E.U. Ministers Stagger Toward Banking Deal

byline.original: By Andrew Higgins and Melissa Eddy
